short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension built to help you ease your online reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Explanable is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your online reading experience. When you encounter difficult concepts or unfamiliar terms while browsing the web, Explanable is here to help.

Key Features:

- Instant Clarification: Simply highlight any text you don't understand and ask your question.
- AI-Powered Explanations: Get clear, concise explanations tailored to your query.
- Seamless Integration: Works on any webpage without disrupting your reading flow.
- Customizable Interface: Adjust the extension's appearance to suit your preferences.
- Editable: The highlighted text comes in a textarea where you can edit the text and include the question you want to ask about the text

How to use:

1. Highlight the text
2. Right click, go to context menus > click Explanable
3. The highlighted text will appear in the text area in the sidebar.
4. Edit it as per your requirements.
5. Click Submit Button
